headline: "Safe streets worker" (replacing police) gunned down in Baltimore
author: Jazz Shaw
sentences: During the course of the madness that promoted “defunding” or abolishing the police, there was an emphasis placed on replacing police in some circumstances with “community safety” workers who would supposedly act as unarmed “violence interrupters” and reduce the number of lethal use of force incidents by police officers.
In Baltimore, Maryland’s violent gang territories, an existing organization known as the “Safe Streets Program” gained a lot of attention and municipal support in this effort.
The goal of the program is to deploy former gang members (or “former”) into areas controlled by the gangs to negotiate nonviolent resolutions to conflicts.

Comments:
Elect Dems every year, push 'Defund the Police,' and go soft on crime, and this is what you get.
